summary: Glow Effect on all arrow types so they\'re actually visible in-flight
descriptionHtml:
Glow Effect on all arrow types so their trajectory is actually visible. There\'s a \'trail\' effect on the original models to improve in-flight visibility but this doesn\'t help much when shooting from first person view.

Extract in Skyrim install dir. To uninstall, remove the arrow meshes.

Enjoy.


Edit:
I won\'t be suporting this mod, it was just intended for personal use before I decided to share it here. Can\'t do any requests as I\'m working exclusively on a New Vegas project. I\'m sure a more sophisticated alternative will appear at some point.
author: Gring
